events.message: Received an application from a highly qualified software engineer with extensive experience in backend development.
Categorized the application under the Engineering cluster due to keywords such as 'software engineer' and 'backend developer' appearing in the resume.
Assigned recruiter John Smith to manage the candidate's application process for the software engineer position.
Completed initial phone screening; candidate demonstrated strong technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.
Candidate expressed enthusiasm about the role and confirmed availability for the technical interview next week.
Scheduled a technical interview for the candidate with the lead developer on May 10th at 10 AM UTC.
